remarks: The sum ` sum_ n e. NN , X ( n ) / n ` is nonzero for all non-principal Dirichlet characters (i.e. the assumption ` X e. W ` is contradictory).  This is the key result that allows us to eliminate the conditionals from ~ dchrmusum2 and ~ dchrvmasumif . Lemma 9.4.4 of [Shapiro], p. 382.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-May-2016.)
